name: COVID19ConfirmedInfectionSNOMED
title: COVID19 Confirmed Infection (SNOMED)
description: Given the variability in coding of diagnoses, this value set will be most useful with robust mapping of source data to the SNOMED reference terms.  VSAC does not support value sets with nonreference codes. SNOMED codes for COVID19 will be added once possible in VSAC.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to support surveillance and monitoring of COVID19 infection),(Data Element Scope: Compilation of SNOMED codes for Confirmed COVID19 infection; Includes only the codes identified by the WHO for this purpose),(Inclusion Criteria: Confirmed COVID19 infection.),(Exclusion Criteria: Suspected infection, Exposure without Confirmed infection)

concept.display: Disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (disorder)
